entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 14 April 2023
